author: NoiselessVolatileLobster
name: CraftyAllowlist
short: Manage Minecraft Bedrock allowlist via Crafty Controller
description: Allows Discord admins to add or remove users from a Bedrock allowlist using Crafty Controller's API with Discord UI Modals.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end-user data.
install_msg: Thanks for installing CraftyAllowlist! Configure it using `[p]craftyallowlistset`.
